props.autoGrow: Automatically grow the textarea depending on amount of text.
props.counterValue: Display the input length but do not provide any validation.
props.persistentPlaceholder: Forces placeholder to always be visible.
props.maxRows: Specifies the maximum number of rows for **auto-grow**.
props.autofocus: The element should be focused as soon as the page loads.

events.keydown: Emitted when **any** key is pressed, textarea must be focused.
events.mousedown:control: Event that is emitted when using mousedown on the main control area.
